items.sentence: The problem is that everybody is too scared to talk to Tom.
The soldiers thought that they might be home for Christmas.
Tom\'s letter didn\'t say when he\'d be arriving in Boston.
I think Tom doesn\'t have the ability to solve the problem.
I had a hard time understanding what Tom was trying to say.
I wish I had had the chance to learn French in high school.
When I was younger, I used to listen to a lot of punk rock.
When did you find out that Tom didn\'t know how to do that?
What I said to you was true, but I shouldn\'t have said it.
Texting while driving isn\'t only illegal, it\'s dangerous.
